column1: Colomiers (Occitan:"Colomèrs") is a commune in the Haute-Garonne department in southwestern France.
It is the largest suburb of the city of Toulouse
column2: and is adjacent to it on the west side. It is a member of the Toulouse Métropole.

column1: In 1971 it became the first area of France to offer zero-fare public transport
column2: but had to cancel this project in 2016.
